meanings.sent1: The unwitted squirrel struggled to find its way back to the tree.
meanings.sent2: She felt unwitted when she couldn't solve the simple puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The unwitted cat tried to catch its own tail, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: His unwitted attempt at telling a joke fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The unwitted student always struggled to grasp new concepts in class.

meanings.sent1: The unwitted child wandered off in the store, unaware of the danger.
meanings.sent2: She felt unwitted when she missed the obvious hint from her friend.
meanings.sent3: The unwitted puppy kept chasing its reflection in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: His unwitted decision to trust a stranger led to trouble.
meanings.sent5: The unwitted driver failed to notice the stop sign, causing a near accident.
